subject: re: fedora and orca
body:
After you're logged in: alt-f2 then type gnome-terminal when the disk 
stops spinning and then hit alt-tab to get on the run button and hit 
enter.  Then type: orca --setup  and the first question you should 
hear is which of two voices to use. Hit either 1 and enter or 2 and enter 
to choose and then answer the rest of the questions.
